title: Create Magic Link -> Account Exists (To Be Automated)
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app version installed.
* User has a valid MLB account
* User is on the Login View
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user fills the Email Address field with an existing MLB account
WHEN the user taps on the "Next" button
AND taps on "Send Me a Link To Log In"
AND a "Check Your Email" message pops up saying "We sent an email to [The Email entered in the email field] with a link to log you in."
AND the user opens their email app
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see an email with "Log In to the MLB app" as a subject
AND a text saying "Click on the button below to securely log in. This magic link will expire in 20 minutes"
AND a button with the text "Log In to the MLB app"

title: Log In with magic Link -> Account Exists (Pending to Confirm for Automation)
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app version installed.
* User has a valid MLB account
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user has received the magic link in their email less than 20 minutes ago
WHEN the user taps on the "Log In to the MLB app" button
custom_expected: THEN the user should be logged in successfully

title: Screens/UI Validations (To Be Automated)
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is in login flow in onboarding/inside app
WHEN user taps on Login without password or reset password

title: Translations (To Be Automated)
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on new magic link flow
WHEN user has device in Spanish
THEN translations should be as expected
custom_expected:
EN: Login Without Password or Reset Password

ES: Iniciar sesión sin contraseña o restablecer contraseña

 

EN: By logging in, I understand and agree to be bound by the MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball  Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

ES: Al iniciar sesión, comprendo y acepto estar sujeto a los Términos de Uso y la Política de Privacidad de MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball 

 

EN: Error. Please enter your password to log in.

ES: Error. Por favor, ingresa tu contraseña para iniciar sesión.

 

EN: Error. Authentication Error. Please check email and/or password and try again.

ES: Error. Error de autenticación. Por favor, verifica el correo electrónico y/o la contraseña e inténtalo nuevamente.

 

EN: Need Help?

ES: ¿Necesitas ayuda?

 

EN: Forgot Password

ES: Olvidaste la contraseña

 

EN: Please enter the email address associated with your MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball  account

ES: Por favor, ingresa la dirección de correo electrónico asociada con tu cuenta de MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball .

 

EN: Select from the following options and we will send a verification email to [email address]

ES: Selecciona una de las siguientes opciones y te enviaremos un correo electrónico de verificación a [dirección de correo electrónico].

 

EN: Send Me an Email to Log In

ES: Enviarme un correo electrónico para iniciar sesión.

 

EN: Reset My Password

ES: Restablecer mi contraseña.

 

EN: We sent an email to bobby.baseball@gmail.com with a link to log you in.

ES: Enviamos un correo electrónico a bobby.baseball@gmail.com con un enlace para iniciar sesión.

 

EN: Open your email app on this device and tap the link to log in.

ES: Abre tu aplicación de correo electrónico en este dispositivo y toca el enlace para iniciar sesión.

 

EN: Haven’t received an email? Check your spam folder or Send Again

ES: ¿No has recibido un correo electrónico? Revisa tu carpeta de correo no deseado o envía nuevamente.

 

EN: Check Your Email

ES: Revisa tu correo electrónico.

 

EN: Thank you. Instructions on resetting your password should appear in your inbox shortly.

ES: Gracias. Las instrucciones para restablecer tu contraseña deberían aparecer en tu bandeja de entrada pronto.

title: Keychain Available (Pending to Confirm for Automation)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user’s credentials are stored in the keychain

WHEN on the sign up screen
custom_expected:
THEN that option should be presented to the user

AND take them through the onboarding flow if selected

title: Keychain Not Available (Pending to Confirm for Automation)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user’s credentials are not stored in the keychain

WHEN on the sign up screen
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user’s credentials are not stored in the keychain

WHEN on the sign up screen
custom_expected: THEN they will be presented with an option to Login with MLB

title: Credential Request (Automated)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has selected to login without using any stored credentials

WHEN presented with the next screen
custom_expected: THEN they will be given an option to Login with their traditional email and password

title: Successful Account Verification (Adam Needs to Fix)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has successfully entered their email and password

WHEN pushed to the next screen

title: Forgot Password (Automated)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has selected the Forgot Password link

WHEN pushed to the next screen
custom_expected:
THEN an email will be prompted to enter their email

AND then will have the option to either login with an email link or reset their password

title: Trigger Magic Link Email on device running MLB App (Duplicate)
custom_steps: GIVEN a user has selected to login using the Email link
custom_expected:
THEN an email will be sent to their inbox based on the email they entered

AND clicking on that link from email on the device running the MLB App will route users back into the app in an authenticated state

title: Magic  link tap from local email - Duplicate?
custom_steps:
GIVEN a magic link has been sent to a users inbox 
WHEN they tap that link from their inbox (browser or email app) on their device
custom_expected: THEN they will be brought back into the app on the Home tab in an authenticated state

title: Magic link tap from another device or local browser
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user who has tapped "Login Without Password or Reset Password" 
AND entered a valid email
AND tapped "Send me an email to Log in"
AND received an passwordless login email
WHEN they tap the Login button in the email on another device (ex. laptop)
custom_expected:
THEN <TBD> 
Note: currently the behavior is user sees a 404

title: Reset password from another device or local browser
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user who has tapped "Login Without Password or Reset Password"
AND entered a valid email
AND tapped "Reset my password"
AND received a reset password email
WHEN they tap the Reset Password button in the email on another device (ex. laptop)
custom_expected: THEN the user is prompted to reset their password and it is successful

title: Invalid Email on "Enter your Email" screen (To Be Automated)
custom_steps: GIVEN a user on the "Enter your Email" page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an improperly formatted email is entered (ex. no @ and .com)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Next button will stay grayed out

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a properly formatted but invalid email is entered
AND Next is tapped
